snippet: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. has left the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota after treatment there for bipolar disorder, officials at the medical facility said.
abstract: Illinois Rep Jesse L Jackson Jr, Democrat who won re-election despite lengthy absence from Congress and virtually no campaigning, leaves Mayo Clinic in Minnesota following treatment for biploar disorder.
lead_paragraph: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. has left the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota after treatment there for bipolar disorder, officials at the medical facility said.
